title: Fabrication and synergistically enhanced photocatalytic activity of ternary kaolinite, TiO<sub>2</sub>, and Al<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub> (K<sub>65</sub>T<sub>30</sub>A<sub>5</sub>) nanocomposite for visible-light-induced degradation of methylene blue and remazol red dye
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Nadira Parvin Lata, Md. Sheum Hussain, Md. Abdulla-Al-Mamun, Taslim Ur Rashid, Sayed Md. Shamsuddin
